sentence.Network_en: On the bridge of his hooked nose was a pair of gold rimless spectacles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的鹰钩鼻上架着一副金色无框眼镜。

sentence.Network_en: Among the guests was a quiet, agreeable man with rimless glasses locking like a college professor.
sentence.Network_cn: 宾客中有一个沉静和蔼的人戴着无边眼镜,看起来象大学教授.

sentence.Network_en: Heyward's aquiline, austere face showed concentration; behind rimless glasses his grey eyes were cool.
sentence.Network_cn: 海沃德那长着鹰钩鼻子的严峻的脸上露出十分专注的神情, 无框眼镜的后面,一双褐色的眼睛闪着寒光.

entry.def: Rimless glasses are glasses which have no frame around the lenses or which have a frame only along the top of the lenses.
